# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is the template for a thesis to be written using Quarto and R Markdown. 

The template is divided in a possible and plausible set of chapters. Some chapters present examples on how to include figures, also in the margin, and how to include references.

To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.

This Preface section can be used for acknowledgements, dedications, or any other introductory text.
